an2.215-219:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing two qualities, one is deposited in heaven as if brought there. What two? (25) Non-anger and non-hostility … (26) Non-denigration and non-insolence … (27) Non-envy and non-miserliness … (28) Non-deceitfulness and non-craftiness … (29) Moral shame and moral dread. Possessing these two qualities, one is deposited in heaven as if brought there."
